analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate ārya mahāgaṇapati hṛdayāya
namaḥ ratnatrayāya

original: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma

original: gṛdhrakūṭaparvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca bodhisatvair mahāsatvaiḥ /
analyzed: gṛdhrakūṭa parvate mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena sārdham ardha trayodaśabhiḥ bhikṣu śataiḥ saṃbahulaiḥ ca bodhisatvaiḥ mahāsatvaiḥ

original: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma //
analyzed: tena khalu punar samayena bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma

original: yaḥ kaścit kulaputra ānanda imāni gaṇapatihṛdayāni dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati tasya sarvāṇi kāryasiddhāni bhaviṣyanti
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid kula putraḥ ānandaḥ imāni gaṇapati hṛdayāni dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati tasya sarvāṇi kārya siddhāni bhaviṣyanti
om namaḥ stu te mahāgaṇapataye svāhā

original: oṃ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ /

om gaṇeśvarāya svāhā
om gaṇapati pūjitāya svāhā

original: oṃ kaṭa kaṭa maṭa maṭa dara dara vidara vidara hana hana gṛhṇa gṛhṇa dhāva dhāva bhañja bhañja jambha jambha tambha (Gph_11)
analyzed: om kaṭa kaṭa maṭa maṭa dara dara vidara vidara hana hana gṛhṇa gṛhṇa dhāva dhāva bhañja bhañja jambha jambha tambha

original: tambha stambha stambha moha moha deha deha dadāpaya dadāpaya dhanasiddhi me prayaccha /
analyzed: tambha stambha stambha moha moha deha deha dadāpaya dadāpaya dhana siddhi me prayaccha
om rudra avatārāya svāhā
om adbhuta vindu kṣubhita citta mahā hāsam āgacchati
mahā bhaya mahā bala parākramāya mahā hasti dakṣiṇāya dadāpaya svāhā
om namaḥ stu te mahāgaṇapataye svāhā

original: oṃ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ /
analyzed: om gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ

om suru suru svāhā

om muru muru svāhā
idam ānanda gaṇapati hṛdayāni

original: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā /
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bhikṣuḥ vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsakaḥ vā upāsikā vā

original: yaḥ kaścit kāryam ālabhate mantrasādhanaṃ vā triratnapūjaṃ vā deśāntaragamanaṃ vā
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid kāryam ālabhate mantra sādhanam vā triratna pūjam vā deśa antara gamanam vā

original: rājakulagamanaṃ vā antardhānaṃ vā tena buddhabhagavatāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā āryagaṇapatihṛdayaṃ
analyzed: rāja kula gamanam vā antardhānam vā tena buddha bhagavatām pūjām kṛtvā ārya gaṇapati hṛdayam

original: saptavārānucārayitavyaṃ sarvakāryāṇi tasya sidhyante nātra śaṃsayaḥ /
analyzed: sapta vārā anucārayitavyam sarva kāryāṇi tasya sidhyante na atra śaṃsayaḥ
sarva kali kalahamarda mātsareṣu nityam śamatavyam sarva praśamam gacchati

original: dinedine kalpam utthāya sarvasaptavārānucārayitavyaṃ mahāsaubhāge bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: dine dine kalpam utthāya sarva sapta vāra anucārayitavyam mahā saubhāge bhaviṣyati
rāja kula gamana kāle mahā prāsādaḥ bhaviṣyanti
śrutidharaḥ bhaviṣyati
na ca asya kāye mahā vyādhayaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: na kaścid eva tārapradakṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyate bhṛṅgo 'vatāraṃ lapsyati na cāsya bodhicittottarāyā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: na kaścid eva tāra pradakṣiṇaḥ vatāram lapsyate bhṛṅgaḥ vatāram lapsyati na ca asya bodhi citta uttarāyāḥ bhaviṣyanti
jātau jātau jātismaraḥ bhaviṣyati

original: idam avocat bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato  #
analyzed: idam avocat bhagavān ātta manāḥ te ca bhikṣavaḥ te bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad sa deva mānuṣa asura garuḍa gandharvaḥ ca lokaḥ bhagavataḥ
bhāṣitam abhyanandan iti
ārya mahāgaṇapati hṛdayam samāptam
